definition: strong/powerful/better/slightly more than/vigorous/violent/best in their category, e.g. see 百強|百强[bai3 qiang2]
to force/to compel/to strive/to make an effort

sentences.english: San Antonio Spurs When healthy, the Spurs are as good as anybody.
sentences.chinese: 只要保持健康，馬刺還是一等一強隊。

sentences.english: The author probed into the advantages and shortages of Chinese women's volleyball team compared with world winning teams.
sentences.chinese: 並探討了中國女排與世界強隊相比的優勢和差距。

sentences.english: Even in the stacked West, that's a tough squad.
sentences.chinese: 即使在強隊林立的西部，這也算的是硬角色。

sentences.english: After Houston, we have a very tough 4-game east coast road trip against Detroit, Boston, Philly and New Jersey.
sentences.chinese: 之後我們又要去東海岸和凱爾特人等強隊進行交手。

sentences.english: Piacenza are a strong side and will certainly fight for promotion.
sentences.chinese: 皮亞琴查是強隊，他們也一定在爲升級而努力。

sentences.english: You don't have the money to compete with the big European leagues.
sentences.chinese: 沒有錢與歐洲的強隊競爭。

sentences.english: McGrady doesn't need money, but he would like a role on a good team.
sentences.chinese: 麥迪不差錢，他願意在一隻強隊裏做一名角色球員。
阿泰斯特果真加入了一支頂級強隊？

sentences.english: The Champions League is more complicated and certain teams in Europe still have more quality then Juventus.
sentences.chinese: 冠軍聯賽更加複雜，並且有一些強隊比尤文更具優勢。

sentences.english: They're a good team, well-organised and Milan will have to be very careful.
sentences.chinese: 巴勒莫是一支攻防有序的強隊，米蘭得小心了。

sentences.english: Juve is a strong team as it is.
sentences.chinese: 照現狀看尤文是一支強隊。

sentences.english: Italy fielded a strong team for the World Cup .
sentences.chinese: 義大利派了一支強隊角逐世界盃。

sentences.english: A:According to the papers, the visiting side is a strong team in America.
sentences.chinese: 根據報道，客隊是美國得一隻強隊。

sentences.english: I hope the team of China will be a strong team one day.
sentences.chinese: 我希望中國足球隊終有一天成爲強隊。

sentences.english: The two teams are Eastern Conference powerhouses.
sentences.chinese: 而且兩隊都是東部強隊。

sentences.english: Since then the Chinese Women' Basketball team has been one of the top-ranked teams in the world.
sentences.chinese: 自從那時起，中國女籃就已開始濟身世界強隊。
